subtitle: A recreation of the 1.21.6 Chase the Skies panorama world.
description:
This map is a faithful recreation of the 1.21.6 "Chase the Skies" panorama world. Ghast positions and camera location are matched so you can create almost perfect menu panoramas for use in a resource pack.

How to create a panorama

  1. Edit the instance in your launcher and set the resolution to 1024x1024.
  2. In game, set FOV to 90 degrees.
  3. Run these commands:
    • Make sure you are not flying (flying slightly changes the FOV)
    /tick freeze
/tp @s 1266.666 105 -125.298 -48 0
/tp @s ~ ~ ~ ~90 0
/tp @s ~ ~ ~ ~90 0
/tp @s ~ ~ ~ ~90 0
/tp @s ~ ~ ~ -48 -90
/tp @s ~ ~ ~ -48 90
  4. After each /tp command, take a screenshot with F2.
  5. In the order they were taken, name the files panorama_0 through panorama_5.
